exception.message: Error: assigned converter type does not match field type. Converter info.documan.xlite.CustomConverterTest$LowerCaseConverter can not be used to convert data of type int. Please check XML annotations on field 'attr2' in class info.documan.xlite.CustomConverterTest$Three.
